      • recNumber

        public java.lang.Character recNumber​(org.opencv.core.Mat frame,
                                     org.opencv.core.Rect figure,
                                     int threshold)
        Parameters:
        frame - openCV representation of an image
        figure - position of the figure on the frame representated as a rectangle
        threshold - an integer representing the threshold for making the image black and white.
        Returns:
        the best matching number/value as a char
